LanguageData.WoW_Tauren.label: Tauren
LanguageData.WoW_Tauren.description: The tauren (shu'halo in their native language of Taur-ahe) are a race of large, bovine humanoids who dwell on the great plains of Central Kalimdor. For countless generations, they were constantly harassed by the violent centaur, who forced the tauren into a nomadic lifestyle in the harsh Barrens. Despite their enormous size, the tauren are a peaceful and honorable people who nonetheless are fierce fighters when roused. Hunting and shamanism are held in high regard in their culture, as is their worship of the Earth Mother and respect for the land and nature.
LanguageData.WoW_Tauren.tools.0.label: left fist
LanguageData.WoW_Tauren.tools.1.label: right fist
LanguageData.WoW_Tauren.tools.2.label: teeth
LanguageData.WoW_Tauren.tools.3.label: head
